CMAKE_MINIMUM_REQUIRED(VERSION 3.1)

PROJECT(uvcpp)

SET(CMAKE_C_FLAGS   "${CMAKE_C_FLAGS} -std=c11 -O2 -fPIC")
SET(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} -std=c++11 -O2 -fPIC")

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/
		    ${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/../libuv/include)

AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/uv  SOURCES)
AUX_SOURCE_DIRECTORY(${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/uv/http  SOURCES)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(
	${PROJECT_SOURCE_DIR}/../../lib/
)

ADD_LIBRARY (${PROJECT_NAME} STATIC ${SOURCES} )

TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(${PROJECT_NAME}  
	libuv.a
	pthread
)
